pageContext.claim: “Ronald Reagan tried many years ago -- got a note from a member of his family -- many years ago tried to get a wall. And he fought for a long time, during his entire term. He was never able to get a wall.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a very strange claim made by Trump. There is no evidence that Reagan considered a wall or fence, according to officials in his administration. “Rather than talking about putting up a fence, why don't we work out some recognition of our mutual problems, make it possible for them to come here legally with a work permit,” he said during a 1980 debate. “And then while they're working and earning here, they pay taxes here. And when they want to go back they can go back.”
